name: KaWaves
description:
KaWaves is a platformer and puzzle game with co-op feature. It tell about two creatures, bounded with an ethereal link that, if broken or roughly teased, will be teared apart, leading to death even the two friends.

HOW TO PLAY:

  • Use W, A, S, D to use Lurlet
  • Use Up, Left, Down, Left to use Chipuka
